description: This file defines React components for an Accordion UI element, utilizing Radix UI primitives and custom styling utilities.

classes.name: Accordion
classes.description: Root component for the Accordion, based on Radix UI's Root.

classes.name: AccordionItem
classes.description: Represents an individual item within the Accordion, with forwarded ref and styling.

classes.name: AccordionTrigger
classes.description: Clickable header that toggles the Accordion content, includes a Chevron icon.

classes.name: AccordionContent
classes.description: Content panel that expands or collapses with animation, containing children elements.

methods.name: React.forwardRef
methods.description: Used to create components that can accept refs and forward them to DOM elements.
